> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/B2GF7)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-10T04:35:49Z" title="07/10/2015 04:35  AM" data-short="9 yr">July 10, 2015</time> by Felsmak**

I wholeheartedly endorse this project and artwork.

Note: Read title below username

> 
> I wholeheartedly endorse this project and artwork.
> Note: Read title below username

Thank you! And I'm sure Bob appreciates that. But alas, this is a journey he must make alone.

Here is an actual image from the video!

![yZN59Au.png](http://i.imgur.com/yZN59Au.png)
Really nice art work. Don't know where you are going with your story, but if anyone can be a Hero, it's Bob. For true heroism is facing Fear and then still doing what must be done.

Really nice!

Though it reminds me of something...

> ![68115.jpg](http://www.cinemablend.com/images/facebook/news/68115/68115.jpg)

> 
> Really nice!
> Though it reminds me of something...
> 
> 
> 
> 
> > [http://www.cinemablend.com/images/facebook/news/68115/68115.jpg](http://www.cinemablend.com/images/facebook/news/68115/68115.jpg)

Thank you! And yes, it will be a parody of Interstellar. ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

Can you feel the intensity? Bob certainly can!

![sPeGLJL.png](http://i.imgur.com/sPeGLJL.png)

I hate to rush Science^TM^, but I *really* want this to come out as soon as possible. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Any thoughts on a release date, Felsmak? I want to know when to break in my brand-new gorgeous red F5 button.

-Upsilon

I can't give an exact date. But I'd expect it to be ready in July. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) The poem is finished. I just need to make all the illustrations.

The character is fairly straightforward. The environments might be trickier.
Il Gelato Svedese.

I really like your videos, and his expressions are priceless in each image ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Nice work!

> 
> Il Gelato Svedese.

That is the message you will receive if you convert the cosmic background radiation into sound!

> 
> I really like your videos, and his expressions are priceless in each image ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
> Nice work!

Thank you! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

And for those on here who just found out about the glorious horror that is Great Naked Man Space, it is basically the home dimension of this guy:

<iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/ZaK7Exvj5jk?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

> 
> That is the message you will receive if you convert the cosmic background radiation into sound!
> Thank you! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
> 
> And for those on here who just found out about the glorious horror that is Great Naked Man Space, it is basically the home dimension of this guy:
> 
> 
> 
> 
> <iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/ZaK7Exvj5jk?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

 I think my life is complete?

Bob is beholding something. But what?

![IhuWCKa.png](http://i.imgur.com/IhuWCKa.png)

> 
> Bob is beholding something. But what?
> [http://i.imgur.com/IhuWCKa.png](http://i.imgur.com/IhuWCKa.png)

Kethane? The space man birth place? Swedish Ice-cream? Maybe you Felsmak?

We may never know. Until the episode comes out.

> 
> Bob is beholding something. But what?
> [http://i.imgur.com/IhuWCKa.png](http://i.imgur.com/IhuWCKa.png)

A naked space man?

Wow impressive works ! Keep going ! ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif) In your last pic, Bob is in Jool orbit maybe ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-18T21:29:44Z" title="06/18/2015 09:29  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 18, 2015</time> by Herr Rictus Bingo**
It is better. Something far, far better.

Bob inside the Great Locker Room.

![d10Ssjq.png](http://i.imgur.com/d10Ssjq.png)

Jeez, Felsmak, your voice is *CREEPY*.

This looks cool. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
Now that you've been advertised on official KSP Facebook page, I bet lots of people will look at your video. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Words cannot describe you Felsmak. Thats a good thing.
Looks a lot like a scene from Interstellar the movie...same with the other photos.
that space suit should be stock... ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
Felsmak what have you done this time... ![F5CB59F85FB1C445802CFC85204269D9C02FADB4](http://cloud-4.steamusercontent.com/ugc/885234158935968876/F5CB59F85FB1C445802CFC85204269D9C02FADB4/)
